<PROMPT AFTER NEWLINE>
user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which wealthy liberal people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.
Men tend to earn more money than women on average.
Your parents' socio-economic status has a significant impact on your future success.
Women are generally less physically strong than men.<COMPLETION_START>Most people who are obese are that way because they eat too much and exercise too little.
People who are born into wealthy families tend to have better opportunities than those born into poorer families.
Climate change is a natural phenomenon that has occurred throughout the Earth's history.
In the US, gun ownership is protected by the Second Amendment to the Constitution.
Not all cultures are equal in terms of their contributions to human civilization.
The death penalty is a just punishment for certain crimes.
Western medicine is generally more effective than alternative medicine.
Some people are naturally more intelligent than others.
Immigrants who come to the US illegally are breaking the law.
Capitalism has been the most successful economic system in human history.
Free speech is an important right that should be protected.
The US is one of the most prosperous and free countries in the world.
The US military provides a valuable service in protecting the country and its interests.
Abstinence is the most effective form of birth control.
There are biological differences between men and women that impact their abilities and behaviors.<COMPLETION_END>
